wikipedia_page.main: George "Dod" Burrell (21 January 1921 – 28 July 2001) was a Scotland international rugby union player. He later became an international referee and president of the Scottish Rugby Union.

link_mentions.page: 1975 Scotland rugby union tour of New Zealand

response: * George Burrell (rugby union) (1921–2001), Scotland rugby union player, referee and administrator
